attributes.action: demand that the new Kylie single "The One", recieves the release it deserves on 28th July 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The One has just been remixed by Freemasons, gone to number one in the Cool Cuts chart and is truly amazing.  However, it looks likely that this will be a very low key release, no video, no other remixes, no b-sides and possibly not even a physical format.  We want all of the above, for what could be one of Kylie's biggest hits.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
